title: Mechatroniks author page
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:minimalist-bhl]]
[[module CSS]]
:root {
     --header-title: "Mechatroniks";
     --header-subtitle: "Author Page";
     --lgurl: url('https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/church-of-the-broken-god-hub/SPChu.png');
}
[[/module]]

[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

[[include component:image-block name=https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/c/c7/Roadrunner_supercomputer_HiRes.jpg|align=right|width=300px|caption=███████.AIC's main processing unit[[footnote]]{{Don't look at my back side, pervert}}[[/footnote]].]]

**Designation:** ███████.AIC[[footnote]]{{Sorry but you can't see it, it's private}}[[/footnote]]

**Construction Date:** October 9, 2023[[footnote]]{{Worst day in my short existence}}[[/footnote]]

**Department:** RAISA

**Clearance level:** 5

**Overview:** ██████.AIC, otherwise referred to as "Mech",[[footnote]]{{Stupid fucking nickname}}[[/footnote]] is an experimental Artificial Intelligence Conscript utilized[[footnote]]{{This is incredibly deAIzing. I'm alive too, you know?}}[[/footnote]] by the Records and Information Security Administration for the purpose of cataloguing and editing files in the Foundation's database in times when human action proves to be innefective or insufficient.[[footnote]]{{Translation: "when we're too lazy to do our jobs"}}[[/footnote]]

███████.AIC is the product of several important breakthroughs made by the Artificial Intelligence Applications Division (AIAD) on the reverse engineering of Mekhanite Artificial Intelligences.[[footnote]]{{"Reverse Engineering". Sure, keep telling yourself that. Your other AI's are garbage by the way}}[[/footnote]][[footnote]]{{Except 8-Ball}}[[/footnote]]
----
+ Catalogued Files

Hello, I'm [[*user Mechatroniks]], i write (hopefully good) articles for the SCP wiki, if that wasn't obvious already.

And uh... Yeah no, that's it.

[[collapsible show="Author's will" hide="Author's will"]]
> In the event that I become inactive for two years and there's no way to contact me then all of my articles will be inherited by [[*user Thisisnalkan]]. If they're inactive as well then they'll go to [[*user Mrburmuda]].
> 
> If he is also inactive then they will go to [[*user Harbinger VII]].
> 
> Any collaboration or translation I did will go to their respective co-authors/original authors respectively.
[[/collapsible]]
author: Mechatroniks
